title: Penta Career Center
text:
Penta Career Center is a Public <a href="Vocational%20school">Vocational</a> <a href="High%20school%20%28North%20America%29">High School</a> (grades 10-12) and <a href="Adult%20Education">Adult Education</a> center located in <a href="Perrysburg%20Township%2C%20Wood%20County%2C%20Ohio">Perrysburg Township, Wood County, Ohio</a>, that opened operation in 1965. It serves 16 school districts from the five counties of <a href="Fulton%20County%2C%20Ohio">Fulton</a>, <a href="Lucas%20County%2C%20Ohio">Lucas</a>, <a href="Ottawa%20County%2C%20Ohio">Ottawa</a>, <a href="Sandusky%20County%2C%20Ohio">Sandusky</a>, and <a href="Wood%20County%2C%20Ohio">Wood</a>, hence the name "Penta."
Programs offered.
High school.
Agricultural Environmental Systems
Arts & Communication
Business & Administrative Services
Construction Technologies
Education & Training
Engineering & Science Technologies
Health Science
Hospitality & Tourism
Human Services
Information Technology
Law & Public Safety
Manufacturing Technologies
Marketing
Transportation Systems
Adult education.
Full Time
Part Time
Medical
Online
